CardGoldenSupportClass - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.Utils.JsonParser.SupportClasses
Class used by the Json parser as a middleman for the creation of CardGolden Objects.
It extends CardResourceSupportClass and mocks all the attributes in CardGolden.
It checks that the inputs provided by the gson deserializer are valid and if so proceeds to create a CardGolden object, otherwise it throws an IllegalArgumentException specifying what is wrong with the inputs provided.
CardGoldenSupportClass() - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.Utils.JsonParser.SupportClasses.CardGoldenSupportClass
 
CardGoldenTest - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Cards
 
CardGoldenTest() - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Cards.CardGoldenTest
 
CardJsonSerializer - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.Utils.JsonParser
A utility class for serializing and deserializing Card objects and lists of Cards to and from JSON format using the Gson library.
Serialization is achieved with one method for all Card classes, de-serialization has to be done using the method for the specific dynamic type.
CardJsonSerializer() - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.Utils.JsonParser.CardJsonSerializer
 
CardJsonSerializerDebug - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.Utils.JsonParser
Class contains static methods to serialize Card->Json and to deserialize Json->Card Objects using the gson library with built-in logic to check for errors in the json.
SERIALIZATION: It is achieved with standard gson library methods. DESERIALIZATION: By default, the gson parser does not check that the deserialized object matches class specifications because it bypasses the constructors for the class.
This implementation makes use of support classes to enforce the usage of constructors in the following way:
Gson is used to parse the input string and is deserialized into an instance of the support class. The support class contains the logic to check that the values read with gson do not break class specifications. If the check is successful, the support class creates and returns the object of the actual class using the appropriate constructors.
CardJsonSerializerDebug() - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.Utils.JsonParser.CardJsonSerializerDebug

CardJsonSerializerDebugTest() - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.Utils.JsonParser.CardJsonSerializerDebugTest
 
CardMap - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Player
This class stores all the information related to the player's placement of cards:
-It stores the Map of placed Cards.
-It stores the available placements for the next round.
-It stores the player's current Resources and Items counters.

CardVisibility - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Player
This class is instanced before playing a card, it stores information about how a card is being played specifically if it's been placed face up or face down and the visibility of its corners when it's being placed and when it will be covered by other cards.
CardVisibility(Card, boolean) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Player.CardVisibility
Default Constructor.
Stores information about card's face orientation and sets all corners' visibility to true as by the game's definition when placing a card it can only be placed on top of other cards meaning all of its corners will be visible.

checkCardColor() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.Utils.JsonParser.SupportClasses.CardResourceSupportClass
Method checks if the provided color value is not null and if so ensures that only RESOURCE type Artifacts are allowed to be cardColor.
If the conditions are broken then throws IllegalArgumentException
checkCentralArtifacts() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.Utils.JsonParser.SupportClasses.CardStarterSupportClass
Method checks if the central artifacts provided are valid.
Method ensures that the central artifacts meet the following requirements:
-Central artifacts can't be empty.
-Central artifacts can't be null.
-Central artifacts can't be in negative quantity.
If the conditions are broken then throws IllegalArgumentException
checkConstraint() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.Utils.JsonParser.SupportClasses.CardGoldenSupportClass
Method checks if the constraint provided is a valid constraint.
Method ensures that the constraint meets the following requirements:
-Constraint can't be empty.
-Constraint can't be null.
-Constraint entries can't have negative values.
-Constraint entries can't have 0 value.
-Constraint can only require a maximum total of 5 artifact units.
-Constraint has to require 2 different types of resources and 3 units if card requires artifact.
-Constraint has to require 2 different types of resources and 4 units if card requires corner.
-Constraint has to require 1 type of resource and 3 units if card provides 3 points outright.
-Constraint has to require 1 type of resource and 5 units if card provides 5 points outright.
If the conditions are broken then throws IllegalArgumentException
checkCorners() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.Utils.JsonParser.SupportClasses.CardResourceSupportClass
Method checks if the provided corners are valid.
Method ensures that corners satisfy following requirements:
-Corner map is not null.
-Corner map is not empty.
-All front facing corners are explicitly declared.
-Corner cant have both Artifact and CornerType as null.
If the conditions are broken then throws IllegalArgumentException
checkCorners() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.Utils.JsonParser.SupportClasses.CardStarterSupportClass
Method checks if the provided corners are valid.
Method ensures that corners satisfy following requirements:
-Corner map is not null.
-Corner map is not empty.
-All front facing corners are explicitly declared.
-All back facing corners are explicitly declared.
-Corner cant have both Artifact and CornerType as null.
If the conditions are broken then throws IllegalArgumentException
checkGameEndingConditions() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Logic.Game
Method verifies whether the conditions for the game-end are met, if so sets to true the lastRound flag.
checkGoldenPoints() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.Utils.JsonParser.SupportClasses.CardGoldenSupportClass
Method checks if the provided points do not contradict the definition of a Golden Card:
-Can't be a negative value.
-Has to be either 1, 2, 3 or 5.
If the conditions are broken then throws IllegalArgumentException
checkInputBound(String, int, int) - Static method in class it.polimi.ingsw.Client.View.InputValidator
Checks user input against specified bounds.
checkPoints() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.Utils.JsonParser.SupportClasses.CardResourceSupportClass
Method checks if the provided points do not contradict the definition of a ResourceCard:
-Can't be a negative value.
-Has to be either 0 or 1.
If the conditions are broken then throws IllegalArgumentException
checkRequiredArtifact() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.Utils.JsonParser.SupportClasses.CardGoldenSupportClass
Method checks if card requires an Artifact as points multiplier.
If requiredArtifact is not null then method ensures that:
-Points has to be 1.
-requiresCorner has to be false
If the conditions are broken then throws IllegalArgumentException
checkRequiresCorner() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.Utils.JsonParser.SupportClasses.CardGoldenSupportClass
Method checks if card requires corners covered as points multiplier.
If reuquiresCorner is true then method ensures that:
-Points has to be 2.
If the conditions are broken then throws IllegalArgumentException

ClientConnector - Interface in it.polimi.ingsw.Client.Network
The ClientConnector interface represents the client-side component responsible for establishing a connection with the server, listening for packets from the server, and sending packets to the server.
ClientConnectorRMI - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.Client.Network
The ClientConnectorRMI class is an implementation of the ClientConnector interface using RMI.
It is responsible for establishing a connection with the server, listening for packets from the server, and sending packets to the server.
ClientConnectorRMI(String, ClientController, ClientModel) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.Client.Network.ClientConnectorRMI
Constructs a ClientConnectorRMI object with the specified server IP address and client controller and then starts the local RMI register and adds itself to it.
Then it connects to the server's RMI listener from which it obtains the id for the client handler, after which it connects to the client handler and confirms the connection.
ClientConnectorSocket - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.Client.Network
The ClientConnectorSocket class is an implementation of the ClientConnector interface using sockets.
It is responsible for establishing a connection with the server, listening for packets from the server, and sending packets to the server.
ClientConnectorSocket(String, ClientController, ClientModel) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.Client.Network.ClientConnectorSocket
Constructs a ClientConnectorSocket object with the specified server IP and client controller.

Corner - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Cards
This class stores information about individual corners of a card.
If the corner type is EMPTY or NULL then its artifact will always be NULL, conversely if the artifact is NULL then Corner will always be expected to be EMPTY or NULL.
If the artifact is not NULL then corner type will always be ARTIFACT, conversely if the corner type is ARTIFACT then the artifact is always expected to not be NULL.
CornerType and artifact are always explicitly stated.
Corner(Artifacts) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Cards.Corner
Constructor that can be used if corner has an artifact that is not Artifacts.NULL, automatically assigns to cornerType value CornerType.ARTIFACT.
Corner(CornerType) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Cards.Corner
Constructor that can be used if corner is EMPTY or NULL, automatically assigns to artifact value Artifacts.NULL.
Corner(CornerType, Artifacts) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Cards.Corner
Constructs a Corner object with the specified CornerType and Artifact.
CornerDirection - Enum Class in it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Cards
